name: Random Girls Brigade
description:
THIS PROJECT IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT!

Made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #4

Defend the colors of the world!

Al van Jant, a very egoistical man, wishes to erase all the colour of the World just because he can. Reine D'Baul, an ex-magical girl tasked with the responsability of supervising the world, decides that she doesnt have the power to stop him all by herself, and thus recruits many other girls from all over the universe in order to fight off his terrible army of creatures made of bleach.

Many things still to come!
  1. Many different types of magical girls.
  2. More stages to defend.
  3. More enemy types.
  4. A better upgrade for the girls.
  5. A basic tutorial.
  6. Better balancing.
  7. Most important: BUG FIXING.
Controls

Mouse: Click on the circles in the map to place the girls.
Click on the girl to upgrade her.

Credits

Art made by Allana_f(https://www.instagram.com/allana_fiorito/) and Rithei(https://twitter.com/NMF_Rithei).
Programing by Rithei.

Music:
Whatever Else by Steve Combs
Boots & Pants by Monkey Warhol

Instalation

Unzip the .rar and run RandomGirlsBrigade.exe.
